name: ToyLang
description: This project is about learning how to create your own programming language. We will be using typescript. using tsc typescript code will be transpilled to javascript

scripts.lexer: cd Lexer && clear && tsc lexer.ts && node lexer.js
scripts.ast: cd AST && clear && tsc ast.ts && node ast.js
scripts.parser: cd Parser && clear && tsc parser.ts && node parser.js
scripts.code: cd Frontend && clear && tsc shell.ts && node shell.js
scripts.run: npm run lexer && npm run parser && npm run code
